name: NUTRI FIT Digital Food Scale, 11lb Kitchen Scale Digital Weight, Cooking Scale for Food Ounces and Grams, 4 Units with 0.1oz/1g Precision, LCD Display with Tare Function

Large weighing panel allows you to read result even with large container. The baking scale is equipped with 4 units of measure; easily convert between grams,ounces, milliliters, kilograms, pounds and ounces (lb:oz, g, ml, fl:oz) Stylish Hanging Design: The sleek design allows you to accent your home kitchen with a modern fashion touch and amazing sight, or effortlessly hang the scale stow as a decoration, Its slim design also makes it easy to store in any cabinet while saving space for the rest of your kitchen essentials. Multi- Function: features a clear LCD display, low power, overload indication and auto-off function after 3 minute of inactivity make weighing your foods Hassle-Free. It will help to save the power while you are not going to use it. Package Included 1 x digital kitchen scale, 2 x AAA batteries, 1 x user manual and lifetime support.

name: KitchenAid KQ908 Glass Surface 11 Pound Capacity Digital Kitchen and Food Scale, Black

An add & weigh Tare function helps to zero out weights of containers before adding food or weighing multiple ingredients together. Conveniently converts both dry and liquid measurements.

name: Ozeri Pronto Digital Multifunction Kitchen and Food Scale,Burnt Ochre
short_description: A winner of awards from the Food Network, New York Magazine’s The Strategist, The New York Times’ Wirecutter, CNN Underscored, and selected by the Dana Farber Cancer Institute for a study on weight loss and the prevention of breast cancer. Accurate, elegant, easy-to-use kitchen scale for all your diet and health goals - weighs up to 11.24 lbs (5100 grams) with precise graduations of 0.04 oz (1 gram). Unit button instantly converts between 6 units (g, lbs, lbs:oz, oz, ml, kg) and Tare button calculates the net weight of ingredients by subtracting the container’s weight. Unit and Tare buttons generate audible and tactile click confirmations, and are separated from the weighing platform to prevent LCD flicker. Runs on 2 AAA batteries (included) with an easy-access battery compartment, and features a programmable 2-to-5-minute automatic power-off setting.
product_description: The new Pronto Digital Kitchen Scale by Ozeri is an uncompromising multifunction scale for the kitchen and home. The Pronto is built with the latest generation in sensor technology to ensure an accurate response for the fast-paced chef and features a newly enlarged weighing platform to accommodate larger bowls and food items. Elegantly designed with a refined finish, the Pronto also doubles as a postage machine for your mail or a scale for your children's science projects. The Pronto's large Unit button lets you change the unit of measurement with push-button ease, with 6 different units to choose from (g, lbs, lbs:oz, oz, ml, kg). The widescreen LCD displays provides wide viewing angle for the fast-moving chef. Manufactured to rigorous quality specifications, the Pronto weighs up to 11.24 pounds (5100 grams) in graduations of just 0.04 ounces (1 gram) to help you achieve your diet and weight goals. The Pronto also features a Tare button which automatically subtracts the weight of any bowl or container to calculate the net weight of your ingredients. The Pronto's buttons provide an audible and tactile click confirmation, and runs on 2 AAA batteries (included), with a 2-minute automatic power-off to preserve battery life.

name: Food Scale, 11lb Kitchen Scale with 6 Units Tare Function & LCD Display, 0.05oz/1g Stainless Steel Digital Food Scale Grams and Ounces for Baking, Cooking, Dieting and Meal Prep (Batteries Included)
short_description: [MULTI-FUNCTION SWITCHING MODE]--Food scale can bear a maximum weight of 11LB, and can also provide you with a weight scale accurate to 1 g/0.05 oz. The measurement results are highly accurate. Food scale grams and ounces also has six unit conversion functions: g/kg/lb/oz/ml/milk ml to meet your different needs. When you are making food, there is no need for complicated operations, just one button to easily switch to any unit you want, providing all-round convenience for kitchen work. [STAY FULL OF ENERGY]--The digital food scale has automatic overload and low battery warning modes, allowing you to receive battery reminders in advance and providing stable support for ensuring kitchen work. Moreover, baking scale is energy-saving and will automatically shut down when not used for two minutes, thereby maintaining its reliable operation for a long time. It is a practical and stable kitchen assistant. [SATISFY GOURMET LIFE]--Kitchen scale is very simple to use. First, tear off the blue protective film on the surface, install the included 2 AAA batteries and select the ON button on the flat surface to turn on the power; secondly, click the UNIT button to select your unit; then, press the Z/T one-button tare function , reset the weight to zero; finally, put the items into the container, allowing you to easily get the net weight. The simple operation brings you a pleasant baking experience. [LIGHT UP DIM VISION]--The digital kitchen scale with LCD display can be used by both the elderly and children. The large screen reads the values accurately, displays the numbers clearly, and does not hurt the eyes. It can provide you with night vision mode in dark environments, providing you with Visual escort. For those who love cooking and baking, this is a food weight scale you can’t put down. [SIMPLE BUT NOT SIMPLE]--The exquisite and compact kitchen food scale is made of high-quality stainless steel. Compared with food scales on the market, it is more waterproof and wear-resistant, and can easily wipe off any stains on the surface to keep it clean and maintained. In order to prevent edge collisions, we adopt a rounded corner design and four anti-slip bases, which increase safety and stability and bring you a more convenient lifestyle.
